{{Infobox dungeon |name = Old Chateau |image = [[File:Old Chateau.png|300px]] |caption = An outside view of the Old Chateau. |tokens = 48,000 |location = West of Route 205. }} The '''Old Chateau''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]].
